From: KSLawdogg@...

Koga Shuko/Unitron/Anubis/Hades/Serpentor/Sixshot/Nemesis 
Enforcer/Scattershot:





Koga Shuko activates his com, seeing Defection and Onyx.  <Defection, you and 
your friend attack the tower!  We will crush it!> he yells, charging forward 
firing two optic blasts off at the base of the tower.


Unitron raised both of his rifles, seeing the autocannon manned by Predacon 
belonging to Hell Beast's pitiful faction.  Aiming precisely, he fired three 
bolts from each rifle, six in all heading for the autocannon.


Anubis took out his missile launcher, firing a rocket off t the top of the 
tower.


Hades raised his rifle, ready to provide cover fire if anyone attacked from 
behind.


Serpentor charged forward, an energy blade in his left hand, the hilt a 
cobra's head with a green energy blade, in his right hand was a plasma rifle. 
 He yelled "Die traitors!" as he fired three plasma bolts off at Transantulas 
(if he isn't in cover, if he is it's at the tower).

===

"Scattershot, transform!" Scattershot yelled, transforming to his robot mode, 
landing on the ground softly, he entered the Alliance base, heading for the 
bridge to get orders.

---

"Understood!" Nemesis Enforcer said, taking out his rapid-firing laser rifle, 
making sure it was charged at full.  "It's battle time!" he yelled, running 
for the engine room chuckling softly.
